title: MoonRise Transparency
intro: There’s no empty talk here. Every line, every block, every address exists to prove: MoonRise is real, visible, and auditable execution. This tab reflects our commitment to those building with us. No promises. Just delivery.

protection.summary: MoonRise protects the economy with logic, code, and automated shielding. Every operation respects limits, applies cooldowns, prevents abuse, and turns every action into real liquidity — fueling the system, blocking manipulation, and making everything visible in real time.
protection.internalEconomy: Every interaction within the MoonRise ecosystem automatically feeds liquidity. Nothing is static. Every click strengthens the system and fuels the financial engine we're building — automated, transparent, and scalable.

dna: ✅ Open-source code and auditable contracts — anyone can verify everything directly on BscScan. Zero centralized control.
✅ Every transaction feeds the ecosystem — no external backing promises, only provable internal structure.
✅ 100% sovereign — no reliance on banks, companies, or third parties. We hold the control. And the execution.
✅ Active anti-whale defense — the system blocks suspicious activity to protect holders and stabilize the chart.
proof_intro: We don’t ask for trust. We show execution. Everything here is trackable in real time through blockchain, images, contracts, and public documents.
proof: 🔥 1.6 billion tokens burned at deploy — visible on BscScan with public hash.
🛠️ Public infrastructure visible — contracts, fees, wallets, and documented operations.
📄 Presale under autonomous contract — no manual control, fixed rules in code.
🧾 Public wallets with tracking — marketing, liquidity, rewards. All visible, nothing hidden.
patrimonio_desc: MoonRise is more than crypto. It’s code, network, and real infrastructure built with discipline and strategic reinvestment. Every fee goes back into the system. Every click feeds the empire. Nothing comes from outside. Everything is born from within.
wallets_desc: All addresses below are part of MoonRise’s public infrastructure. They are trackable, verifiable, and visible in real time on the blockchain.
wallets_locked_note: Wallet locked for 1 year after deploy

governance.title: Temporary and Transparent Governance
governance.intro: During the presale phase, the contract is controlled by a visible and limited owner() — with the sole purpose of protecting the integrity of the initial operation.

can.title: What the owner CAN do
items: Pause and resume the contract in case of attack

cannot.title: What the owner CANNOT do
items: Bypass limits defined in the contract

lock_reason.title: Why are tokens locked?
lock_reason.paragraph_1: Liquidity, marketing, development, and reserve tokens are protected by automated time locks via the MasterVault contract. This ensures that no funds will be used prematurely, safeguarding the project economy and preventing abuse, diversion, or early movement.
lock_reason.paragraph_2: The contract is public, auditable, and immutable. You can verify each line directly on the blockchain:

moonchain.title: Transition to MoonChain
moonchain.content: The current governance is provisional. After MoonChain’s launch, the MNR token will be migrated to the native blockchain, and all centralized control functions will be eliminated. Control is tactical. Sovereignty lies in the destination: MoonChain.
